title: Allow default main window size to be configurable
body: When creating a new WPF application using Visual Studio 2015 the main window that is created defaults to a size that is not convenient for some projects. Instead of having to alter XAML code or physically alter the main window dimensions for every new window created why not provide a default configuration setting for the main window size so that every new item that is added to a project has the same default main window size?
